INSERT INTO SALES ( SALE_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, QUANTITY, UNIT_PRICE, SALE_AT, DELETED ) VALUES ( #{saleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{customerId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{productId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{quantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{saleAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NAME FROM ( SELECT p.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM SALES s JOIN PRODUCTS p ON s.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID JOIN CUSTOMERS c ON s.CUSTOMER_ID = c.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE c.COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName} AND NVL(s.DELETED, 0) = 0 AND NVL(p.DELETED, 0) = 0 AND NVL(c.DELETED, 0) = 0 GROUP BY p.PRODUCT_NAME ORDER BY CNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT s.SALE_ID, s.CUSTOMER_ID, s.PRODUCT_ID, s.QUANTITY, s.UNIT_PRICE, s.SALE_AT, s.CREATED_AT, s.UPDATED_AT, c.COMPANY_NAME as customerName, p.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, p.SALE_PRICE as productPrice FROM SALES s JOIN CUSTOMERS c ON s.CUSTOMER_ID = c.CUSTOMER_ID JOIN PRODUCTS p ON s.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE NVL(s.DELETED, 0) = 0 AND NVL(c.DELETED, 0) = 0 AND NVL(p.DELETED, 0) = 0 AND TRUNC(s.SALE_AT) = TRUNC(#{saleDate}) ORDER BY s.SALE_AT DESC
